gen_corr()[source]¶
gen_times(dt0=None, ndtmax=0.9, nbinsmin=121)[source]¶

Returns times and bins to use with adaptative binning methods. Sensible values for these parameters must be found by hand, and depend on the characteristics of input data.

dt0:

minimum bin size, also used as step in a.b. default: dt0 = 0.25*(tmax -tmin)/np.sqrt(t1.size*t2.size+1) (more or less a statistically reasonable binning, to increase precision)

ndtmax:

Maximum size of bins (in units of dt0). 0 < ndtmax < 1: fixed dt (=dt0) (no a.b) 1 < ndtmax: allow adaptative time binning default: 0.9

nbinsmin:

if the data has a lot of error, higher values are needed to soften the correlation beyond spurious variability. default: 121 (11x11)
